definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Next door, Chueh-min struck a match and lit the oil lamp.
sentences.chinese: 在隔壁房间里觉民把火柴擦燃，点了灯。

sentences.english: Do you think matches striking causes pineapple to fall.
sentences.chinese: 你们认为划火柴导致菠萝掉下？

sentences.english: The man struck a match to light a cigar.
sentences.chinese: 那人划着了一根火柴扑灭一根香烟。

sentences.english: The man struck a match and lit his cigar.
sentences.chinese: 那人划了根火柴点燃雪茄。

sentences.english: Once upon a time a little girl tried to make a living by selling matches in the street.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，一个小女孩试图使生活在街上卖火柴。

sentences.english: Then cut the remaining stick in two, lengthwise.
sentences.chinese: 然后纵向把火柴切成两长条。

sentences.english: The burned scents from ustulate milk and matches make me hungry.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: As he came close and lit the match, his eyes inadvertently locked with line.
sentences.chinese: 在他靠近并递过火柴时，他的眉头不经意的皱了皱。

sentences.english: Biro claimed to me that an assistant had given him permission to take it.
sentences.chinese: 比罗则向我声称是一位助手允许他拿走火柴。

sentences.english: He pulled off his gloves, took out his matches, and lighted the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他脱下了自己的手套，掏出了火柴，点燃了火苗。

sentences.english: The man reached again into his pocket for the matches.
sentences.chinese: 他又把手伸到口袋里面去掏火柴。

sentences.english: Clutching his matches he set out along the main road towards Xizhimen Crate.
sentences.chinese: 拿着两包火柴，顺着大道他往西直门走。

sentences.english: After use, devices can be burned with a match, preventing contamination.
sentences.chinese: 用完后，划根火柴就能烧掉它，还能够防止污染。

sentences.english: I've got a matchbox of a room.
sentences.chinese: 我得到一间像火柴盒大小的房间。

sentences.english: When milk or matches are burnt, they give out a smell of burning and I feel hungry at the smell .
sentences.chinese: 牛奶烧糊了，火柴烧黑了，那焦香我闻见了就觉得饿。

sentences.english: Do not strike matches or lighters, try to avoid coughing whilst your opponent is at the table.
sentences.chinese: 当你的对手在台面击球时，不能划火柴或点燃打火机。

definition: see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
